note:
Someone who lives amongst dragons. Even if most of those dragons are non-native lizard species in suburban Florida.

I'm most interested in environmental science and adjacent topics, esp. climate change, environmental policy, and sustainability. But all sciences are fascinating!

Profile pic: common snapping turtle (Chelydra serpentina) swimming in shallow water above a dirt-colored bottom, seen from above.
